!Blacksmith Pushkin: *Pure Mithril*...! It isn't a material that just anyone can handle. The skill of refining and crafting *pure Mithril* is handed down to selected Artisans even in my esteemed *Black Moru Guild*. However it is very difficult to get *pure Mithril* nowadays. At one time *Pure Mithril* could be found in the mine field that we Dwarves operated long ago, but it is very rare since we stopped the operation due to the arrival of earthworm. However there is one place that we can find it... [Quest _218_TestimonyOfLife 30300_4| Ask where to get pure Mithril.]
